{{Wireless embedded system |brand=DirecTV |model=DCAW1R0-01 |revision= |upc=600603139024 |asin=B005RCZEIY |fcc_date=01/31/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=STB bridge |fcc_id=NKR-DTVDCCK |pcb_id=48.J7152.0GA |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=AMCC |cpu1_model=PowerPC 405EX;AMCC, PowerPC, 405EXr; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL128ELT2I-90G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR-Y5C |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=looks like it,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, J19 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, pinout marked,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, J4 |wi1_module=DirecTV DCAW1R0-01 Wireless Module |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip1_model=PSB 8231;PSB8231EL, V1.1, XWAY WAVE300, H1306, TNFV721L02; |wi1_chip2_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip2_model=PSB 8301;PSB 8301 V, V1.1, XWAY WAVE300, K96864.1, GE033; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E6031;88E6031-LAJ1, D0T743.2, 1035 A1G, CN; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE2593;SiGe, 2593A20, 033AHHF;3; ,,, MoCA 1.0 controller;Entropic Communications;EN2210;ENTROPIC, EN2210-BG2, U5336AGA, 1031 KOREA;1; ,,, MoCA transciever;Entropic Communications;EN1212;ENTROPIC, EN1212C1, 100000113, 1314;1; |flags=MoCA 1.0, manual GPL request needed |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.33; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=30:14:4A, A8:54:B2 |oui_eth=30:14:4A, A8:54:B2 }} {{TagLine|STB Bridge}} :This unit is part of the '''DirecTV''' ''Cinema Connection Kit''. "48.J7152.0GA" and "2010/11/24" is silkscreened on a production model board. "48.J7151.SGE" and "2010/10/07" is silkscreened on the back of the WAVE300 :mPCIe module in the FCC photos. The PCI ID of the WAVE300 card is '''1a30:0710 (1a30:0711)'''. {{WiFiCert|WFA10841|02/18/2011}} ===Serial=== ====Info derived from==== {{SCollapse|boot log |
